lead_paragraph: Joe Montana, Joe Greene and Emmitt Smith are among the 22 Pro Football Hall of Famers voted to the Super Bowl 50 Golden Team.

headline.print_headline: 22 Hall of Famers Make Super Bowl Golden Team
headline.main: 22 Hall of Famers Make Super Bowl Golden Team
